samples.context: By keeping the surroundings clean and dry we can prevent mosquitoes from breeding. Try to make a list of measures which help to avoid the spread of malaria. Vaccination to be given at suitable age. Maintain personal hygiene and good sanitary habits.
samples.question: What measures can prevent the spread of malaria?

samples.context: All mosquitoes breed in water. Hence, one should not let water collect anywhere, in coolers, tyres, flower pot, etc.
samples.question: Why should we not let water collect around us?

samples.context: We should keep a handkerchief on the nose and mouth while sneezing. It is better to keep a distance from infected persons.
samples.question: What should we do when we sneeze?

samples.context: Use mosquito net and repellents. Spray insecticides and control breeding of mosquitoes by not allowing water to collect in the surroundings.
samples.question: How can we control mosquito breeding?

samples.context: Consume properly cooked food and boiled drinking water. Maintain personal hygiene and good sanitary habits.
samples.question: What food safety measures should we take?
